text: La Gloria is a corregimiento in Changuinola District, Bocas del Toro Province, Panama. It has a land area of and had a population of 3,046 as of 2010, giving it a population density of . It was created by Law 18 of February 26, 2009. ==References== Category:Corregimientos of Bocas del Toro Province
title: La Gloria, Bocas del Toro
